issues.message:
Primary CTA "
Download Your Free Checklist
" is 7493px below the fold
issues.recommendation: Move CTA button above fold (within first viewport height) for better visibility and conversion
issues.impact: High - 70% of users never scroll below fold

issues.message: Form has 3 fields (recommended max: 1 for lead capture)
issues.recommendation: Reduce form friction by minimizing fields. Ask only for essential information (e.g., email only for lead magnet)
issues.impact: Medium - Each additional field reduces conversion by ~11%

recommendations.title: Fix Critical Conversion Issues
items: Move CTA button above fold (within first viewport height) for better visibility and conversion
recommendations.impact: Immediate action required - these issues significantly harm conversion

recommendations.title: Reduce Form Friction
items: Reduce form friction by minimizing fields. Ask only for essential information (e.g., email only for lead magnet)

issues.message: Readability score: 50.8 (target: 65+, reading level: 10th-12th grade (fairly difficult))
issues.recommendation:
Simplify language:
  - Use shorter sentences (avg 15-20 words)
  - Choose common words over complex ones
  - Break up long paragraphs
  - Use active voice instead of passive
issues.impact: Medium - Complex copy reduces comprehension and conversion

issues.message:
Headline lacks benefit-focused language: "
Don't Waste 6 Months Building What Nobody Wants
"
issues.recommendation: Frame headline around user benefit (Get, Learn, Discover, Achieve)
Expand headline to 5-10 words for clarity and SEO
issues.impact: Low - Short headlines may lack clarity

issues.message: Headline lacks benefit-focused language: "No accessibility or performance issues detected."
issues.recommendation: Frame headline around user benefit (Get, Learn, Discover, Achieve)
Expand headline to 5-10 words for clarity and SEO
issues.impact: Low - Short headlines may lack clarity

headlines: Don't Waste 6 Months Building What Nobody Wants
No accessibility or performance issues detected.

issues.recommendation: Add 2-3 authentic testimonials with real names and companies to build trust
issues.impact: Medium - Social proof increases conversion by 15-34%

issues.recommendation: Add privacy policy link in footer (legal requirement + trust signal)
issues.impact: High - Required by GDPR/CCPA, absence reduces trust significantly

issues.recommendation:
Use genuine scarcity only (Monzo principle: trust over tricks):
  - Add data-countdown attribute to countdown timers
  - Add data-spots-remaining attribute for limited availability
  - Remove vague urgency language if not backed by real data
issues.impact: High - Fake urgency destroys trust when discovered

issues.message: Only 1 type of social proof found
issues.recommendation: Add additional social proof types for stronger credibility
issues.impact: Low - Multiple proof types compound trust

issues.recommendation: Enable HTTPS/SSL certificate (required for collecting user data)
issues.impact: Critical - Browsers warn users, destroys trust

issues.message: No security badges found near form
issues.recommendation: Add security badges near data collection forms to build trust
issues.impact: Low - Security indicators reduce form abandonment
